settings.gg7ClOb5kRL_text: Absolutely. It meets international safety standards, featuring reinforced stitching, heavy-duty buckles, and lumbar support to ensure secure, ergonomic wear.

settings.ggS_ij0hi_Q_text:
1) The Kids Station Essential Feeding Set contains an eating Bowl and Spoon. Meeting all your needs, this complete kids’ tableware set will help you manage your baby’s feeding needs from the time they start solids as infants well into their toddler years.

 

2) Made of 100% food-grade silicone, the Kids Station Feeding Set for baby is non-toxic, BPA Free, phthalate free, lead free, paint free and free from all other harmful chemicals. 

 

3) The Kids Station Silicone Feeding Set for toddlers is made with non-stick, food grade, pure silicone material, which is stain resistant, odourless, and safe to use in your microwave, dishwasher, oven, or freezer. 

 

4) Kids Station kid plates and bowls have great suction technology, which ensures an excellent hold, and prevents your kids from spilling food. 

 

5) Make mealtime fun with the cute designs and thoughtfully designed products which are part of the kids Essential Feeding Set that can promote self-feeding and self-weaning.

 

6) Get all the essentials you need for your kid’s mealtime in one thoughtfully crafted package. 

 

7) Beautifully packaged with a focus on safety, design and durability, the Kids Station Essential Feeding Set if the perfect gift for those special moments like Baby Showers, Mother’s Day, First Birthday, Diwali, Christmas or Children’s Day.
